DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer , gender 18 45 year age , Subjects must provide sign informed consent prior participation studyrelated procedure Body Mass Index 19,5 29 kg/m2 IOP < /= 21 mmHg eye Have BCVA ( Best correct visual acuity ) > /= 0.8 ( 20/25 ) ( Snellen scale ) , < /= 0.1 ( LogMar unit ) eye Normal Fluorescein Clearance Test eye Normal funduscopy eye Pregnant breastfeeding female positive pregnancy test . Females childbearing potential use medically acceptable contraceptive method selection hole study . Current relevant disease , include respiratory disease , cardiovascular , endocrine , neurological , haematological , renal , neoplastic , hepatopathy , gastrointestinal distress , hypertension , infectious acute process Previous chronic process rebound characteristic could interfere study accord investigator 's judgment . Volunteers receive pharmacological treatment , include medicinal plant , four week previous begin study . Having use anticholinergic , betablockers corticoids sporadically last 30 day whichever route administration , med ocular nasal administration route .
